org.aiwolf.common.data

Interface Player


  • public interface Player
    Player for AI Wolf
    Implements player to create Agent for AI Wolf
    Author:
    tori

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Agent attack()
      Decide agent who to be attacked by wolves.
      void dayStart()
      Called when the day started.
      Agent divine()
      Dicide agent to divine by Seer.
      void finish()
      Called when the game finished.
      Before this method is called, gameinfo is updated with all infomation.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the player name.
      Agent guard()
      Dicide agent to guard by BodyGuard.
      void initialize(GameInfo gameInfo, GameSetting gameSetting)
      Called when the day started.
      java.lang.String talk()
      Each player can talk their opinions throw this method.
      Return texts must be written in aiwolf protocol.
      void update(GameInfo gameInfo)
      Called when the game information updated.
      Agent vote()
      ExecutedVote agent to execute.
      java.lang.String whisper()
      Each wolves can talk thier opinions throw this method.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Get the player name.
        Returns:
        Player name

        Called when the game information updated.

      • initialize

        void initialize(GameInfo gameInfo,
                GameSetting gameSetting)
        Called when the day started.
        Parameters:
        gameInfo - Game informations
        gameSetting - Game settings

      • dayStart

        void dayStart()
        Called when the day started.

      • talk

        java.lang.String talk()
        Each player can talk their opinions throw this method.
        Return texts must be written in aiwolf protocol. When you return null, it will be considered as SKIP.
        Returns:
        Aiwolf protocol based talk

      • whisper

        java.lang.String whisper()
        Each wolves can talk thier opinions throw this method.
        Returns:
        Aiwolf protocol based whisper

      • vote

        Agent vote()
        ExecutedVote agent to execute.
        Returns:
        Agent of vote target

      • attack

        Agent attack()
        Decide agent who to be attacked by wolves.
        Returns:
        Agent of attack target.

      • divine

        Agent divine()
        Dicide agent to divine by Seer.
        Returns:
        Agent of divine target

      • guard

        Agent guard()
        Dicide agent to guard by BodyGuard.
        Returns:
        Agent of guard target

      • finish

        void finish()
        Called when the game finished.
        Before this method is called, gameinfo is updated with all infomation.
